BA1.name: Initiate...
actionEtc: If a target opposing model is in range, [em]after its first action[/em], Attack.

BA2.name: Searching...
actionEtc: If a target opposing model is in range, [em]after its first action[/em], Attack.
If no valid targets, model moves towards [b]nearest uncontrolled/contested objective[/b]

BA4.name: Move & Attack
actionEtc: If no valid targets, model moves towards [b]nearest uncontrolled/contested objective[/b]

BA5.name: Move & Attack
actionEtc: If no valid targets, model moves towards [b]nearest objective[/b] and interacts with it when able.

BA6.name: Protecting...
actionSecondary: When attacked, activate a [em]reactive superpower[/em] when able.
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves to the [b]nearest terrain[/b] for cover.

BA7.name: Cautious...
actionSecondary: When attacked, activate a [em]reactive superpower[/em] when able.
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves to the [b]nearest terrain[/b] for cover.

BA8.name: Acquired
actionSecondary: If a target opposing model is in range, [em]after its first action[/em], Attack.
When attacked, activate a [em]reactive superpower[/em] when able.

BA9.name: Cover...
actionSecondary: When attacked, activate a [em]reactive superpower[/em] when able.
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] retaining cover.

BA10.name: Flank
actionEtc: If there are valid targets, in range, [em]while in cover[/em], Attack.
If no valid targets, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] retaining cover.

BA11.name: Pursuit...
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b].

BA12.name: Assault!
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] and attacks.
If no valid targets, this model moves towards [b]nearest objective[/b] and interacts with it when able.

BA13.name: Targeting...
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves towards [b]nearest model[/b] (most wounds)

BA14.name: Targeting...
actionEtc: If no valid targets, this model moves towards [b]nearest random[/b] model.

BA15.name: Pursuing...
actionEtc: If no valid targets, model moves towards [b]nearest random[/b] model.

BA16.name: Targeting...
actionEtc: If no valid targets, model moves towards the [b]nearest objective[/b] and interacts with it when able.
